snippet: Shares fell sharply amid fears that early investors eligible to offload their stocks would create a surplus on the market.
abstract: Facebook shares fall more than 6 percent to a new low of $19.87 amid fears that early investors eligible to offload 271 million shares will create a surplus on the market; stock has declined by near half of its original offering price of $38.
lead_paragraph: Shares fell sharply amid fears that early investors eligible to offload their stocks would create a surplus on the market.

headline.seo: Facebook Shares Hit New Low as a Lockup Period Ends
headline.main: Facebook Shares Hit New Low as a Lockup Period Ends
headline.print_headline: Facebook Shares Hit New Low Amid Fear
